name: Azantime
0:
”Alexa, open azan call”
”Alexa, Call for Azan”
”Alexa, Play Azan”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: azan call
des:
Azan is the "call for prayer" which is recited in Arabic language before any prayer of the day. There are very few options of Azan to select from in Alexa skills. This skill is an additional option available on Alexa for any Muslim around the globe to be able to hear Azan when setting up the Alexa routine on their devices. The skill is designed to play azan when you setup Alexa routines for:
1. Zuhr Prayer (Noon)
2. Asr Prayer (1 hour before sunset)
3. Magrib Prayer (Sunset)
4. Isha Prayer (1 hour after the sunset). 

Our team is also working on the Fajr Prayer (Dawn) Azan which will be available soon on Alexa Skills.

Disclaimer: The skill content (The Azan) is in the Arabic language.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
